page.title: 18A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: I woke up at six a.m. and got up at 6.30.I got dressed and had a fight with my teddy.I had my breakfast at nine o'clock.My dad and I collected Gary and went to play football.The teams were me and Gary versus Neil and Karl.The score was eighteen to them, seventeen to us.Then we went home.For lunch I had crisps,a cob and a drink. I went swimming with dad and Annette.I played underwater fighting. For dinner I had chips and a drink and watched television until half past eight.I played snooker until nine o'clock.I played in bed for two hours and fell asleep at eleven o'clock.Dad turned my television off.
